transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Like I am speaking from IndiaMART register Hyderabad se bol raha hu main IndiaMART register karwai thi.
Executive: Company name kya hai sir?
Customer: AR Eco India same number jis number se call kiya na isi number se aapko IndiaMART register karwa.
Executive: Aapka company name kya hai sir? Company name bataiye.
Customer: AR Eco India.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: AR Eco India.
Executive: Thik hai. Sir aap mujhe na 5 minute dijiye main 5 minute mein call kar rahi hu aapko ek meeting mein thi main, thik hai?
Customer: Ah sorry mujhe aapke foran foran se to call kahan se aayega?
Executive: Isi number se call aayega. Main aapke account manager hu. Main abhi call kar rahi hu aap mujhe 5 minute dijiye. AR Eco India na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Thik hai. Main karti hu 5 minute mein call.
Customer: Yeah. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to confirm IndiaMART registration details.

Resolution:

- Executive asked for 5 minutes to check details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 5 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- registration, company name, account manager
